attributes.action: bring the necessary pressure on the french government to ensure that no immigrants gathering at the so called camps at Calais are allowed to travel to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have enough illegal immigrants in this country, we certainly do not need more. 
The revenue generated from taxation is not and endless pot. 

The quality of life for our citizens must be protected, as should what is left of our British identity.

Anyone who wishes to come here should only be considered having followed the proper procedures for immigration.

Those who arrive illegally should be rounded up and sent back to whereever they came from, enough is enough.


It is time steps were taken to protect our way of life, our identity and our quality of life, which is being steadily eroded by mass immigration.
